OOC: Airly, can you reply to my characters soon?




IC:




MCGOWAN / BARR=
YMORE





(McGowan is struck by several bullets in her left shoulder. She =
notices Lokk and avoids the others. She fires a missile at Lokk...)



(Bar=
rymore gets struck by one of the missiles, almost knocking her off her feet=
. She jumps over the other missile and fires 4 laser beams at Axis...)

  -=
---- Original Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Friday, July 06, 2001 10:26 PM
  Subject: Clash 


  --- Lynxiz / Axi=
s / Lokk ---

  Lynxiz reaches the base of the mountain, and transforms, dr=
awing 
  her disk launcher. She aims, and fires three impact explosive disk=
s 
  at the largest target there, Train Wreck. She growls to herself, 
  "Y=
ou ain't gettin away easy this time." She prepares for another 
  round of =
fire.

  Axis, who is standing around with Lokk and Seekker, is suprised 
 =
 when weaponfire starts streaking around him. "Whoa, that was 
  close!" He=
 turns around, and spots some bots he knows: Train 
  Wreck, McGowan and he=
r group, and Deemos. He watches the 
  fighting until Lokk smacks him, "Axi=
s, wake up, we've gotta defend 
  the base." Lokk draws his twin chain guns=
, and starts running 
  towards McGowan, firing continuously. Shells litter=
 the ground, 
  behind him.

  Startled, Axis draws his charging laser, and=
 his missile launcher. 
  He looks around, unsure of which enemy bot to att=
ack. He yells to 
  Lokk, "Lokk, which one should I attack?" Exasperated, L=
okk calls 
  back, " Just chose one!" So Axis looks around again, and spots=
 
  Barrymore. He follows Lokk firing two missiles at Barrymore, and 
  pow=
ering up his large laser.


  On 6 Jul 2001, at 20:53, Rudra656@... wro=
te:

  > OOC: The posts confused me so I'm not sure where the battle is.  I=
f it
  > isn't near the base then just ignore this post.
  > 
  > ::Aerotau=
r::
  >     He looks around and spots the incoming train.  "Umm... Grounded=
 I
  >     think 
  > we're out of time."  He fires 8 shots at Train Wreck.=

  >

bject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
